page.title: 10SHOPS AND SERVICES
page.content: { SHOPS AND SERVICES St. Keverne is a fairly large village and so is capable of supporting 2 grocers,a hairdressers,two electrical shops, a delicatessen/butcher, a slaughterer/butcher. There are 2 newsagents one at each end of the village both owned by the same family, one of which also offers a mini-supermarket. There is also a gift shop catering for tourists which also sells necessary household equipment. A garage supplies petrol, coal and offers MOT and repairs. The furniture maker also sells his wares direct. The post office also sells fresh vegetables. A bus service provides transport to Helston twice a week though there are two daily school buses, one to Mullion and one to Helston. Transport is also provided for students at the College.
